title: using image-create with nova command , and taking snapshot  of a VM from dashboard fails with  HTTP 403 Error

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rajesh-battala

comments.content: Looks like the user you're using is not authorized to create servers of take snapshots ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
The user setup is

Tenant :  Administrator
user :  root.

Roles Assigned : Admin, KeystoneServiceAdmin, KeystoneAdmin.


With this "root" user when logged in dashboard will have the "system panel"

using this "root" user can create, delete, instances, quotas, users etc.

I have tried the same operation creating different users under differnt tenants .  I have got the same error.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rajesh-battala

comments.content:
I'm getting the same. How do I confirm whether I have authorization to create servers and snapshots?

comments.content:
In Openstack Essex version, 

1. Snapshot of a VM using nova image-create is possible.

2. Snapshot of a VM from dashboard is possible.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sailaja-pashumarthy
